    • Player

      public Player(GameBoard gameboard, int ID, Color color, boolean three_players) throws EriantysException
      Creates a player
      Parameters:
      gameboard - model of reference
      ID - player id
      color - player's tower color
      three_players - true if 3 players mode
      Throws:
      EriantysException - game-semantic error
